Name: Veridian Weapon
HPText: [HP] per player character [MIN]. Each section of the ship has 1/3 of its max HP, rounded up.
PhasesDescription: When a section is destroyed, lower the Megabomb counter by 1. Each remaining section gains an ability depending on which section was destroyed.

Actions.Name: Overlock Piston
Actions.Description: The Engine pops a piston out of the deck in any space within range 4 of the engine, which becomes a targetable height 1 destructible object with 10 hp. When destroyed, it explodes for a blast 1 explosion centered on it, dealing fray damage to all characters within. If two or more pistons are active at the end of the round, all Engine parts gain +1 boon on all saves and attacks. If three or more are active, also increase the Megabomb counter by 1.

Actions.Name: Lurch
Actions.Description: All characters are shoved 1 in the same direction as the ship speeds up or slows down.
Actions.Collide: Character takes 3 piercing damage instead of regular collide damage.

Actions.Name: Mega Gun Turret
Actions.Hit: [D]+[fray] and foe is branded and shoved 1.

Actions.Name: Pop-up Turret
Actions.Description: The Turret summons an automaton turret anywhere on the battlefield.

Summons.Name: Automaton Turret
Summons.SummonEffects: The Turret counts a height 1 object for abilities and grants cover. When summoned, or once on the turret's turn, the automaton can use the following attack:

Combo.Name: Tracking Missile
Combo.Description: A foe in range 8 is marked.
Combo.Mark: At the end of their turn, if they are still marked, the turret fires a missile at them. They must save or take 2[D]+[fray], or [D]+[fray] on a successful save, then the mark ends.
Combo.Effects: If they are adjacent to an Overlock Piston or automaton, this missile hits the the piston or automaton instead, dealing only fray damage to the marked character and instantly destroying the automaton or piston.

Actions.Name: Deck Sweeper
Actions.Description: Deal damage equal to the current round number+1 to all foes. Foes in cover from the turret or adjacent to an automaton take no damage.

Actions.Name: Rotary Cannons
Actions.AreaEffect: All foes in range 6 take 3 piercing damage.

Actions.Name: Shield Automata
Actions.Description: The section summons an automata in range 6.

Summons.Name: Shield Automata
Summons.SummonEffects: The automata has aura 2. Characters inside the aura, including foes, have cover. When summoned and once on the aft turret's turn, may move up to 3 spaces.

Combo.Name: Combat Automata
Combo.Description: The section summons an automata in range 6.

Summons.Name: Combat Automata
Summons.SummonEffects: While in the aura of a Shield Automata, is immune to all damage, but can be destroyed by a Tracking Missile.
